sentences.sContent: This is the energy of an ultraviolet photon, a "large" energy on the atomic scale .
sentences.sContent_eng: This is the energy of an ultraviolet photon, a "large" energy on the atomic scale .
sentences.sCn: 这是一个紫外光子的能量，在原子尺度上，它是一个“大”能量。

sentences.sContent: This in turn left its mark on the polarization of the next photon, so amplifying the signal.
sentences.sContent_eng: This in turn left its mark on the polarization of the next photon, so amplifying the signal.
sentences.sCn: 光子就这样轮流地将它的偏振标记留给下一个光子，因而增强了信号。

sentences.sContent: The light from these dim objects arrives at a trickle of only one photon per minute in each square centimeter.
sentences.sContent_eng: The light from these dim objects arrives at a trickle of only one photon per minute in each square centimeter.
sentences.sCn: 当这些昏暗物体发出的光抵达地球，在每平方公分内每分钟只有一个光子。

words.tran: 测光的；光度计的；光度测定的
光度计的；光测量的；光度学的（等于photometric）
光度测定研究，光度测定

trans.tranOther: a unit of  energy  that carries light and has  zero mass
